page.title: 07OUR POLICE
page.content: Nowadays Police are more modernised.In Edenham the Policeman are PC Clark and Pc Morton.Every so often the Police come round Edenham in their Police cars seeing that nothing has happened the night before.At our School the Police come and give advice to road safety and they do cycling proficiency.Sometimes Police come and sit near the main road and take the speeds of the cars.Once the Policeman went to the coal merchant over the road to the School because there was a bent oil sign.Nowadays some Policemen may be going on bicycles because buying cars and buying petrol to run the cars is very expensive.On the main road near our School there is a thirty mile an hour speed limit.If the cars break the limit they get fined by the Police.They are caught in a trap.
